RULES AND MODS


Server rules:

- ONLY use German, English or Klingon language in chat

- NO Camping / parking in the trader zone

- NO sniping of the trader zone (if safezone or not)

- NO Griefing

- NO Ganking

- NO base raping

- NO Glitching / Hacking / Exploit Using

- NO Trolling

- NO Salvage of locked vehicles

- NO Lift / Tow of locked vehicles


Mods and how they work:

- Trader Stock - The stock of the trader automaticly refull after 2 days. The amount of many items is random. There will be no manual refull.

- Trade from vehicle - Near you vehicle 30m to the trader (weapons and ammo) and you can trade all items of the vehicle at ones.

- Skeetmachine - A Anti-Zombie Shield. Reciept: 1x Plot-Pole, 2x Fuelbarrels, 1x Portable Generator, 1x Engine Part
